name: Poetry Land
description:
ESC: pause menu

WASD: move

E: interact 

INFO: Built this game in Processing as a medium to showcase some poetry that I wrote in my advanced creative writing class. You can walk around the map and interact/read poems that you find. You can access the controls
in game using the pause menu, but I'll also put them above.

NOTICE: I found the textures for the motorcycle, trees, chair, and fence on google images. Every other texture was made by me using Aseprite. Also, the sounds were downloaded from freesound.org.
